```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(data.table)
```

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
d <- knitcitations::read.bibtex("publications.bib")
citations <- formatC(sum(scholar::get_citation_history("75oKEWoAAAAJ")$cites), big.mark = " ", format = "f", digits = 0)
```

`r length(d)` scientific articles (`r citations` [citations](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=75oKEWoAAAAJ&hl=en&oi=ao)).

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results = "asis"}
print(d, .opts = list(sorting="ydnt", bib.style = "authoryear", max.names = 1, dashed = F, style = "html"))
```
